text: Pitești is a city in Muntenia, Romania. It is the capital and largest city of Argeș County. It is on the river Argeș. In 2021, 141,275 people lived there. Pitești is an important commercial and industrial center and has two universities. == References == == Other websites == * Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Argeș County
title: Pitești
